Description:
Enterprise-Grade AWS Security Framework
This template creates a comprehensive security infrastructure including:
- IAM roles and policies with least privilege access
- Network security with properly configured security groups
- Encrypted S3 storage with KMS customer-managed keys
- Comprehensive monitoring and compliance logging

Author: AWS Security Architect
Version: 1.0
Last Updated: 2024

Environment.Description: Environment name for resource tagging and configuration

ProjectName.Description: Project name used for resource naming and tagging

TrustedIpRange.Description: Trusted IP range for administrative access (RFC 1918 private networks recommended)

ComplianceRetentionDays.Description: Log retention period in days for compliance (minimum 1 year, maximum 10 years)

CloudWatchRetentionInDays.Description: Retention period (days) for CloudWatch Logs groups (must use supported values)

EnableCloudTrail.Description: Set to "true" to create CloudTrail resources. Default "false" avoids regional trail limits.

NumberOfAZs.Description: Number of Availability Zones to use (set 1 for single-AZ regions)

Description.Fn::Sub: Customer-managed KMS key for S3 encryption - ${ProjectName}-${Environment}
Customer-managed KMS key for CloudTrail encryption - ${ProjectName}-${Environment}

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for web tier - allows HTTP/HTTPS traffic from internet and administrative access from trusted networks

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: SSH access from trusted IP range

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for application tier - allows access from web tier and administrative access from trusted networks

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: SSH access from trusted IP range

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for data tier - allows database access from application tier only
Security group for management and monitoring tools - restricted to trusted networks

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: SSH access from trusted IP range

SecurityGroupEgress.Description: All outbound traffic for management operations

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alert when VPC Flow Logs are not being delivered

DataSubnetIds.Description: IDs of the data tier subnets

S3EncryptionKeyArn.Description: ARN of the S3 encryption KMS key

SecurityDashboardName.Description: Name of the CloudWatch security dashboard
